meanings.sent1: The unvalued painting was left in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: She felt unvalued by her friends when they forgot her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The unvalued toy suddenly became the favorite when the puppy found it.
meanings.sent4: His unvalued efforts finally received recognition at the awards ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The unvalued gem turned out to be a priceless diamond.

meanings.definition: Not assigned a specific value or worth.
meanings.sent1: The unvalued antique vase was sold at a garage sale for a low price.
meanings.sent2: The unvalued currency was exchanged for a higher value in the foreign market.
meanings.sent3: The unvalued coupon turned out to be expired when she tried to use it.
meanings.sent4: Her unvalued collection of stamps turned out to be rare and valuable.
meanings.sent5: The unvalued land was later discovered to be rich in resources.
